--- Astroblast ---

Astroblast changes directions when he hears Megatron. He jumps up, 
and transforms into spaceship mode, his hatch opening as he levels in 
front of Megatron.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron chuckled again. "Optimus Prime was new my dear Raptor. 
Where is
> he now?" Megatron asked, spitting the challenge. He then looked 
around
> him, noticing he was not in the most suitable position however. He 
had
> accomplished their main objective however. He stopped swinging the 
mace,
> and his shoulder cannon emitting a blast of stored energy straight 
at
> the ground, pushing up the dirt, and creating a lot of smoke, 
encircling
> Megatron. He then glew out of it, and towards 
Astroblast. "Astroblast,
> transform" he ordered.
